name: Up Is Down
description:
Epic Megajam 2022 submission.

Team Name : Sicko

Gameplay Instructions
Controls:

W - move forward

S - move backwards

A - move to the left

D - move to the right

Q - change weapon

Left Click : shoot

what platform was this built for : 

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam.

- Crescent Moon Staff by magicc 

- Time Machine by Batuhan13

- Clone Machine by uenostation54

- Animated Monster (Kaonashi - No Face) by Klaimtrev

- m1911 from blendswap
